start.name: Gazzaev Timur.
start.title: I'm a software engineer.
start.description:
Specialized in web application development. 
Currently, I'm focused on backend and VoIP development.

about.heading: About Me
about.start: I am {age}. I was born in the Republic of North Ossetia-Alania.
about.hobby: From an early age I was interested in electronics. Helped me develop in this area my school - RFMLI.
about.bio: At the age of 11 I soldered my first PCB. And at 16, I first started programming Arduino controllers.
about.fakeBio: A year later, I assembled my first engine, and at 20 I introduced the Iron Man suit to the world.
about.bioContinue: A year later, I entered the RTU MIREA and diligently engaged in web development
about.end: Since then, I have been involved in everything from landing page layout to microservice architecture design. One thing I know for sure: I love it.

projects.heading: My projects
projects.fidar:
High-speed anonymous VPN with unlimited traffic, built on Wireguard technology. 
It is possible to select the country of the VPN server.
projects.dzera:
Smart AI assistant. Telegram is used as an interface for interaction. 
Powered by OpenAI gpt4.0 kernel. 

Added function for saving dialog context.
projects.talker:
Voice anonymous chat. The system randomly connects users to a call. Supported on mobile and desktop browsers. 

In the future, algorithms for selecting by city, age and gender will be added.

contacts.heading:
Contact me. 
I am always online.
